eeka yakage nithiyakya.ayi yako thriwil ekath wahanayak newa.mekath panthi bedaya wardhanaya kirima sandaha dhanawadi palakayin yedu thawath ek kumanthranayak bawa apata pahadili wiya.namuth thuwakku aththe un atha bawin api muwin nobana gala uda paharu balalun men pasekata wi sitiyemu.apith boruwata athdakim ekathu karannata baswala nogihin pappa aran dun lamboginiye aawanan melahakatath kanda udaya.dan giya nuwana eelanga chandaya enakan addawannata bari nisa api pasekata wi ata kan manthranayak karannata wuye kandata yana aakaraya thiranaya kara ganimataya.kolambaa sita mepamana durak pamina ithuru kilomitar kipaya noya aapasu yamata wada 'harakiri' kramayata bada kapagena miya yama mana baw thiranaya kala api kama bima paseka la ho wan rathayak kuliyata gena kanda mudunatama yamata thiranaya kara gaththemu.
